name: Papich - The Game Ep.1
description:
If you ever felt like trying on the shoes of "the greatest of all", then this project is just for you!

Papich - The Game Episode 1

A unique opportunity to feel and understand the philosophy of the "Daddy/Papanya". Be in HIS shoes during the Grand Start of the stream as well as during the stealth mission for the balyk.

During a sweaty-sweaty game you can: Shove your leg up out table, fix your mic. eat, drink, fest to your heart's content, your morale is to be of grand highs!

If your arse is starting to smoke up - open up the window, what are your choices in a "1v9" after all, and then proclaim your soulful "Nyyyyaaa!" Feeling this is priceless!

The gameplay doesn't limit itself onto the room computer time. Once in a while you have to go out for a cheeky balyk early in the morning and you meet other world-famous legend-worthy characters.

Interested?
Can you take the role of 'the greatest' upon yourself?
Go on then have a try, but "if you enter - have no fear, if you exit - shed no tear"

-Pixel graphics filled with various details

-Atmosphere transmits everything to the smallest detail

-Excellent music suitable for every moment in the game

-Solid tests will test you for durability

-Various achievements and secrets
